alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:59PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central McCurtain and northern Red River Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Broken Bow to near Sawyer. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Idabel, Broken Bow, Bagwell, Manchester, Wright City, Valliant, Detroit, Millerton, Annona, Garvin, Rufe, Hochatown, Woodland, Redland, Kanawha, Glover, Kiomatia, Oak Hill and Golden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
